To Kumo et all....
 Firstly I should put my position here on the board...I feel that the amount 
of useless bickering here in the past has simply been a waste of time, space 
and thought on the parts of all involved..Maybe he was right...Maybe he 
wasn't..bottom line is what do we accomplish from it either way? Nothing! 
Please...from now on lets keep it all based on the acquiring of knowledge 
about the Samurai..and not let it disintegrate into one big 'Sengoku 
Jidai'!!!!
 Kumo..thanks for the apology to everyone..it shows your spirit..Can we now 
please get on with the REAL questions?
 Abayo all...
 Ben.
